format: A data frame with 3920 observations on the following 4 variables.

parameters.brcancer: 1 if subject had breast cancer, 0 if not
parameters.age: Age at onset of breast cancer, or current age if no breast cancer
parameters.mutant: 1 if first degree relative proband was a BRCA mutation carrier, 0 if not

title: ashkenazi
description:
Description
This is a random subset of data from the Struewing et al. (1997) study of Ashkenazi
jews and breast cancer. The subset consists of pairs of first-degree female
relatives who are also first degree relatives of a proband.
